name: CUSTOM Before/after #3
liquid_code:
<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.css"
/>

{%- liquid 
  assign padding_horizontal = section.settings.padding_horizontal
  assign padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign padding_top = section.settings.padding_top
  assign padding_bottom = section.settings.padding_bottom
  assign border_color = section.settings.border_color
  assign border_thickness = section.settings.border_thickness
  assign margin_top = section.settings.margin_top
  assign margin_bottom = section.settings.margin_bottom
  assign background_color = section.settings.background_color
  assign background_gradient = section.settings.background_gradient
  assign full_width = section.settings.full_width
  assign content_width = section.settings.content_width
  assign lazy = section.settings.lazy

  assign heading = section.settings.heading
  assign heading_size = section.settings.heading_size
  assign heading_size_mobile = section.settings.heading_size_mobile
  assign heading_color = section.settings.heading_color
  assign heading_custom = section.settings.heading_custom
  assign heading_font = section.settings.heading_font
  assign heading_height = section.settings.heading_height
  assign heading_align = section.settings.heading_align
  assign heading_align_mobile = section.settings.heading_align_mobile

  assign sub_heading = section.settings.sub_heading
  assign sub_heading_size = section.settings.sub_heading_size
  assign sub_heading_size_mobile = section.settings.sub_heading_size_mobile
  assign sub_heading_color = section.settings.sub_heading_color
  assign sub_heading_custom = section.settings.sub_heading_custom
  assign sub_heading_font = section.settings.sub_heading_font
  assign sub_heading_height = section.settings.sub_heading_height
  assign sub_heading_align = section.settings.sub_heading_align
  assign sub_heading_align_mobile = section.settings.sub_heading_align_mobile
  assign sub_heading_mt = section.settings.sub_heading_mt

  assign slider_mt_mobile = section.settings.slider_mt_mobile
  assign slider_mt = section.settings.slider_mt

  assign images_gap_mobile = section.settings.images_gap_mobile
  assign images_gap = section.setitngs.images_gap

  assign image_border_color = section.settings.image_border_color
  assign image_border_thickness = section.settings.image_border_thickness
  assign image_radius = section.settings.image_radius
  assign image_ratio = section.settings.image_ratio
  assign image_ratio_mobile = section.settings.image_ratio_mobile

  assign badge_before = section.settings.badge_before
  assign badge_after = section.settings.badge_after
  assign badge_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.badge_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign badge_padding_horizontal = section.settings.badge_padding_horizontal
  assign badge_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.badge_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign badge_padding_vertical = section.settings.badge_padding_vertical
  assign badge_border_color = section.settings.badge_border_color
  assign badge_border_thickness = section.settings.badge_border_thickness
  assign badge_radius = section.settings.badge_radius
  assign badge_size = section.settings.badge_size
  assign badge_size_mobile = section.settings.badge_size_mobile
  assign badge_color = section.settings.badge_color
  assign badge_custom = section.settings.badge_custom
  assign badge_font = section.settings.badge_font
  assign badge_height = section.settings.badge_height
  assign badge_bg_color = section.settings.badge_bg_color

  assign content_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.content_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign content_padding_horizontal = section.settings.content_padding_horizontal
  assign content_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.content_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign content_padding_vertical = section.settings.content_padding_vertical

  assign customer_size = section.settings.customer_size
  assign customer_size_mobile = section.settings.customer_size_mobile
  assign customer_color = section.settings.customer_color
  assign customer_custom = section.settings.customer_custom
  assign customer_font = section.settings.customer_font
  assign customer_height = section.settings.customer_height
  assign customer_align = section.settings.customer_align
  assign customer_align_mobile = section.settings.customer_align_mobile

  assign text_size = section.settings.text_size
  assign text_size_mobile = section.settings.text_size_mobile
  assign text_color = section.settings.text_color
  assign text_custom = section.settings.text_custom
  assign text_font = section.settings.text_font
  assign text_height = section.settings.text_height
  assign text_align = section.settings.text_align
  assign text_align_mobile = section.settings.text_align_mobile
  assign text_mt = section.settings.text_mt

  assign product_label_size = section.settings.product_label_size
  assign product_label_size_mobile = section.settings.product_label_size_mobile
  assign product_label_color = section.settings.product_label_color
  assign product_label_custom = section.settings.product_label_custom
  assign product_label_font = section.settings.product_label_font
  assign product_label_height = section.settings.product_label_height
  assign product_label_align = section.settings.product_label_align
  assign product_label_align_mobile = section.settings.product_label_align_mobile
  assign product_label_mt = section.settings.product_label_mt

  assign product_size = section.settings.product_size
  assign product_size_mobile = section.settings.product_size_mobile
  assign product_color = section.settings.product_color
  assign product_custom = section.settings.product_custom
  assign product_font = section.settings.product_font
  assign product_height = section.settings.product_height
  assign product_align = section.settings.product_align
  assign product_align_mobile = section.settings.product_align_mobile
  assign product_mt = section.settings.product_mt

  assign arrow_size = section.settings.arrow_size
  assign arrow_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_size_mobile
  assign arrow_icon_size = section.settings.arrow_icon_size
  assign arrow_icon_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_icon_size_mobile
  assign arrow_color = section.settings.arrow_color
  assign arrow_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_hover_color
  assign arrow_bg_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_color
  assign arrow_bg_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_hover_color
  assign arrow_border_thickness = section.settings.arrow_border_thickness
  assign arrow_border_color = section.settings.arrow_border_color
  assign arrow_border_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_border_hover_color
  assign arrow_show_desktop = section.settings.arrow_show_desktop
  assign arrow_show_mobile = section.settings.arrow_show_mobile

  assign dots_size = section.settings.dots_size
  assign dots_size_mobile = section.settings.dots_size_mobile
  assign dots_show_desktop = section.settings.dots_show_desktop
  assign dots_show_mobile = section.settings.dots_show_mobile
  assign dots_color = section.settings.dots_color
  assign dots_mt = section.settings.dots_mt

  assign bottom_mt = section.settings.bottom_mt
  assign bottom_border_thickness = section.settings.bottom_border_thickness
  assign bottom_border_color = section.settings.bottom_border_color
  assign bottom_align = section.settings.bottom_align
  assign bottom_align_mobile = section.settings.bottom_align_mobile

  assign bottom_title_size = section.settings.bottom_title_size
  assign bottom_title_size_mobile = section.settings.bottom_title_size_mobile
  assign bottom_title_color = section.settings.bottom_title_color
  assign bottom_title_custom = section.settings.bottom_title_custom
  assign bottom_title_font = section.settings.bottom_title_font
  assign bottom_title_height = section.settings.bottom_title_height

  assign bottom_text_size = section.settings.bottom_text_size
  assign bottom_text_size_mobile = section.settings.bottom_text_size_mobile
  assign bottom_text_color = section.settings.bottom_text_color
  assign bottom_text_custom = section.settings.bottom_text_custom
  assign bottom_text_font = section.settings.bottom_text_font
  assign bottom_text_height = section.settings.bottom_text_height
  
-%}

{%- style -%}

  {{  heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  sub_heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  badge_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  customer_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  product_label_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  product_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  bottom_title_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  bottom_text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  
  .section-{{ section.id }} {
    border-top: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
  }
  
  .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
  }

  .before-after-heading-{{ section.id }} {
    text-align: {{ heading_align_mobile }};
  }

  .before-after-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ heading_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ heading_color }};
    line-height: {{ heading_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
  }

  .before-after-subheading-{{ section.id }} {;
    margin-top: {{ sub_heading_mt | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    text-align: {{ sub_heading_align_mobile }};
  }

  .before-after-subheading-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ sub_heading_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ sub_heading_color }};
    line-height: {{ sub_heading_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
  }

  .before-after-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ slider_mt_mobile }}px;
    position: relative;
  }

  .before-after-slide-{{ section.id }} {
    display: grid !important;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(1, 1fr);
    align-items: center !important;
    gap: 25px;
  }

  .before-after-images-{{ section.id }} {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
    gap: {{ images_gap_mobile }}px;
  }

  .before-after-image-{{ section.id }} {
    border-radius: {{ image_radius }}px;
    border: {{ image_border_thickness }}px solid {{ image_border_color }};
    overflow: hidden;
    position: relative;
  }

  .before-after-image-{{ section.id }} img,
  .before-after-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .before-after-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    background-color: #DADADA;
  }

  .before-after-info-{{ section.id }} {
    padding: {{ content_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ content_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
  }

  .before-after-badge-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    text-align: center;
    padding: {{ badge_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ badge_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    border-radius: {{ badge_radius }}px;
    border: {{ badge_border_thickness }}px solid {{ badge_border_color }};
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ badge_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ badge_color }};
    line-height: {{ badge_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    font-weight: 700;
    position: absolute;
    top: 10px;
    background-color: {{ badge_bg_color }};
  }

  .before-after-first-{{ section.id }} .before-after-badge-{{ section.id }} {
    left: 50%;
    transform: translateX(-50%);
  }

  .before-after-second-{{ section.id }} .before-after-badge-{{ section.id }} {
    right: 50%;
    transform: translateX(50%);
  }

  .before-after-customer-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    font-size: {{ customer_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ customer_color }};
    line-height: {{ customer_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-align: {{ customer_align_mobile }};
  }

  .before-after-text-{{ section.id }} {
    text-align: {{ text_align_mobile }};
    margin-top: {{ text_mt | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
  }

  .before-after-text-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ text_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ text_color }};
    line-height: {{ text_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
  }

  .before-after-product-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;
    margin-top: {{ product_label_mt | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    font-size: {{ product_label_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ product_label_color }};
    line-height: {{ product_label_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-align: {{ product_label_align_mobile }};
  }

  .before-after-link-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;
    margin-top: {{ product_mt | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    font-size: {{ product_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ product_color }};
    line-height: {{ product_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-align: {{ product_align_mobile }};
    text-decoration: none;
    font-weight: 700;
  }

  .before-after-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
  .before-after-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    position: absolute;
    z-index: 2;
    top: 10%;
    width: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_color }};
    border-radius: 50%;
    background: transparent;
    background: {{ arrow_bg_color }};
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
    cursor: pointer;
    -webkit-appearance: none;
    padding: 0px;
  }

  .before-after-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} {
    left: 0px !important;
  }

  .before-after-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    right: 0px !important;
  }

  .before-after-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg,
  .before-after-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg {
    height: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    flex: 0 0 {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
  }

  .before-after-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg {
    transform: rotate(180deg);
    margin-left: 2px;
  }

  .before-after-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg {
    margin-left: -2px;
  }

  .before-after-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg path,
  .before-after-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    fill: {{ arrow_color }};
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
  }

  .before-after-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover ,
  .before-after-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
    border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_hover_color }};
    background: {{ arrow_bg_hover_color }};
  }

  .before-after-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path,
  .before-after-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path {
    fill: {{ arrow_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
  }

  .before-after-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled,
  .before-after-btn-next-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled {
    opacity: 0.3;
  }

  .before-after-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
    padding: {{ dots_mt }}px 0px;
    position: static !important;
    width: 100%;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    border-bottom: {{ bottom_border_thickness }}px solid {{ bottom_border_color }};
  }

  .before-after-pagination-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination-bullet {
    width: {{ dots_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ dots_size_mobile }}px;
    border: 2px solid {{ dots_color }};
    background-color: transparent;
    opacity: 0.6;
  }

  .before-after-pagination-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination-bullet.swiper-pagination-bullet-active {
    opacity: 1;
    background-color: {{ dots_color }}
  }

  .before-after-bottom-{{ section.id }} {
    padding-top: {{ bottom_mt | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
  }

  .before-after-bottom-item-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: {{ bottom_align_mobile }};
    gap: 20px;
    width: 100%;
  }

  .before-after-bottom-item-{{ section.id }}.active {
    display: flex;
  }

  .before-after-bottom-title-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ bottom_title_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ bottom_title_color }};
    line-height: {{ bottom_title_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
  }

  .before-after-bottom-text-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ bottom_text_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ bottom_text_color }};
    line-height: {{ bottom_text_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
  }

  @media(min-width: 768px) {
   .before-after-info-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ content_padding_vertical | times: 0.5 | round: 0 }}px {{ content_padding_horizontal | times: 0.5 | round: 0 }}px;
    }
  }
  
  @media(min-width: 1024px) {

    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px;
      margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px;
    }
    
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      padding: 0 5rem;
      padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px;
      padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px;
      padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
      padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
    }

    .before-after-heading-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: 0px !important;
      text-align: {{ heading_align }};
    }

    .before-after-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ heading_size }}px;
    }

    .before-after-subheading-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: 0px !important;
      margin-top: {{ sub_heading_mt }}px;
      text-align: {{ sub_heading_align }};
    }

    .before-after-subheading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ sub_heading_size }}px;
    }

    .before-after-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ slider_mt }}px;
      padding: 0px {{ arrow_size }}px;
    }

    .before-after-slide-{{ section.id }} {
      grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
      gap: 0px;
    }

    .before-after-images-{{ section.id }} {
      gap: {{ images_gap }}px;
    }

    .before-after-badge-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ badge_padding_vertical }}px {{ badge_padding_horizontal }}px;
      font-size: {{ badge_size }}px;
    }

    .before-after-first-{{ section.id }} .before-after-badge-{{ section.id }} {
      left: 15px;
      transform: translateX(0);
    }
  
    .before-after-second-{{ section.id }} .before-after-badge-{{ section.id }} {
      right: 15px;
      transform: translateX(0);
    }

    .before-after-info-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ content_padding_vertical }}px {{ content_padding_horizontal }}px;
    }

    .before-after-customer-{{ section.id }} {
      font-size: {{ customer_size }}px;
      text-align: {{ customer_align }};
    }

    .before-after-text-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ text_mt }}px;
      text-align: {{ text_align }};
    }

    .before-after-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ text_size }}px;
    }

    .before-after-product-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ product_label_mt }}px;
      font-size: {{ product_label_size }}px;
      text-align: {{ product_label_align }};
    }

    .before-after-link-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ product_mt }}px;
      font-size: {{ product_size }}px;
      text-align: {{ product_align }};
    }

    .before-after-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .before-after-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      width: {{ arrow_size }}px;
      height: {{ arrow_size }}px;
      top: 50%;
      transform: translateY(-50%);
    }

    .before-after-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} {
      left: -{{ arrow_size | times: 0.5 }}px !important;
      transform: translate({{ arrow_size | times: 0.25 | round: 0 }}px,-50%);
    }
  
    .before-after-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      right: -{{ arrow_size | times: 0.5 }}px !important;
      transform: translate(-{{ arrow_size | times: 0.25 | round: 0 }}px,-50%);
    }

    .before-after-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg,
    .before-after-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg {
      height: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
      flex: 0 0 {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
    }

    .before-after-pagination-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination-bullet {
      width: {{ dots_size }}px;
      height: {{ dots_size }}px;
    }

    .before-after-bottom-{{ section.id }} {
      padding-top: {{ bottom_mt }}px;
    }

    .before-after-bottom-item-{{ section.id }} {
      justify-content: {{ bottom_align }};
    }

    .before-after-bottom-title-{{ section.id }} {
      font-size: {{ bottom_title_size }}px;
    }

    .before-after-bottom-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ bottom_text_size }}px;
    }
  }
  
{%- endstyle -%}

{% unless full_width %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      max-width: {{ content_width }}rem;
    }
  </style>
{% endunless %}

{% if heading_custom %}
  <style>
    .before-after-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ heading_font.family }}, {{ heading_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ heading_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ heading_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if sub_heading_custom %}
  <style>
    .before-after-subheading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ sub_heading_font.family }}, {{ sub_heading_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ sub_heading_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ sub_heading_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if badge_custom %}
  <style>
    .before-after-badge-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ badge_font.family }}, {{ badge_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ badge_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ badge_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if customer_custom %}
  <style>
    .before-after-customer-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ customer_font.family }}, {{ customer_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ customer_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ customer_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if text_custom %}
  <style>
    .before-after-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ text_font.family }}, {{ text_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ text_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ text_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if product_label_custom %}
  <style>
    .before-after-product-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ product_label_font.family }}, {{ product_label_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ product_label_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ product_label_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if product_custom %}
  <style>
    .before-after-link-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ product_font.family }}, {{ product_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ product_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ product_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if bottom_title_custom %}
  <style>
    .before-after-bottom-title-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ bottom_title_font.family }}, {{ bottom_title_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ bottom_title_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ bottom_title_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if bottom_text_custom %}
  <style>
    .before-after-bottom-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ bottom_text_font.family }}, {{ bottom_text_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ bottom_text_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ bottom_text_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if image_ratio_mobile == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    .before-after-image-{{ section.id }} {
     aspect-ratio: 9.6/14; 
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio_mobile == "landscape" %}
  <style>
    .before-after-image-{{ section.id }}{
     aspect-ratio: 12/9; 
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio_mobile == "square" %}
  <style>
    .before-after-image-{{ section.id }} {
     aspect-ratio: 12/12; 
    }
  </style>
{% else%}
  <style>
    .before-after-image-{{ section.id }} {
     aspect-ratio: auto; 
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if image_ratio == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
     .before-after-image-{{ section.id }} {
       aspect-ratio: 9.6/14; 
      } 
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio == "landscape" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .before-after-image-{{ section.id }}{
       aspect-ratio: 12/9; 
      }
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio == "square" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .before-after-image-{{ section.id }} {
       aspect-ratio: 12/12; 
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else%}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .before-after-image-{{ section.id }} {
       aspect-ratio: auto; 
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_mobile %}
  <style>
    .before-after-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .before-after-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .before-after-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .before-after-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_desktop %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .before-after-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
      .before-after-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
        display: flex;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .before-after-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
      .before-after-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if dots_show_mobile %}
  <style>
    .before-after-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex !important;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .before-after-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none !important;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if dots_show_desktop %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .before-after-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
        display: flex !important;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .before-after-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none !important;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_mobile %}
  <style>
    .before-after-heading-{{ section.id }},
    .before-after-subheading-{{ section.id }},
    .before-after-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: 0px {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    }

    .before-after-bottom-{{ section.id }} {
      padding-left: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
      padding-right: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_desktop %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .before-after-bottom-{{ section.id }} {
        padding-left: {{ arrow_size }}px;
        padding-right: {{ arrow_size }}px;
      }
      .before-after-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
        padding: 0px {{ arrow_size }}px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .before-after-bottom-{{ section.id }} {
        padding-left: 0px;
        padding-right: 0px;
      }
      .before-after-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
        padding: 0px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

<div class="section-{{ section.id }} before-after-{{ section.id }}" style="background-color:{{ background_color }}; background-image: {{ background_gradient }};">
    <div class="section-{{ section.id }}-settings">
      {% if heading != blank %}
        <div class="before-after-heading-{{ section.id }}">{{ heading }}</div>
      {% endif %}
      {% if sub_heading != blank %}
        <div class="before-after-subheading-{{ section.id }}">{{ sub_heading }}</div>
      {% endif %}

      <div class="before-after-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }}">
        <div class="before-after-slider-{{ section.id }} swiper">
          <div class="swiper-wrapper">
            {% for block in section.blocks %}
              <div class="before-after-slide-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide">
                <div class="before-after-images-{{ section.id }}">
                  <div class="before-after-first-{{ section.id }} before-after-image-{{ section.id }}">
                    {% if block.settings.before_image != blank %}
                      <img src="{{ block.settings.before_image | image_url }}" alt="{{ block.settings.before_image.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>
                    {% else %}
                      {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                    {% endif %}
                    {% if badge_before != blank %}
                      <div class="before-after-badge-{{ section.id }}">{{ badge_before }}</div>
                    {% endif %}
                  </div>
                  <div class="before-after-second-{{ section.id }} before-after-image-{{ section.id }}">
                    {% if block.settings.after_image != blank %}
                      <img src="{{ block.settings.after_image | image_url }}" alt="{{ block.settings.after_image.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>
                    {% else %}
                      {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                    {% endif %}
                    {% if badge_after != blank %}
                      <div class="before-after-badge-{{ section.id }}">{{ badge_after }}</div>
                    {% endif %}
                  </div>
                </div>
                <div class="before-after-info-{{ section.id }}">
                  {% if block.settings.customer != blank %}
                    <p class="before-after-customer-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.customer }}</p>
                  {% endif %}
                  {% if block.settings.text != blank %}
                    <div class="before-after-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.text }}</div>
                  {% endif %}
                  {% if block.settings.product_label != blank %}
                    <p class="before-after-product-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.product_label }}</p>
                  {% endif %}
                  {% if block.settings.product.title != blank %}
                    <a href="{{ block.settings.product.url }}" class="before-after-link-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.product.title }}</a>
                  {% endif %}
                </div>
              </div>
            {% endfor %}
          </div>
          <div class="before-after-pagination-{{ section.id }} swiper-pagination"></div>
        </div>
        <button class="before-after-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}">
          <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><g><path d="M14,17a1,1,0,0,1-.707-.293l-4-4a1,1,0,0,1,0-1.414l4-4a1,1,0,1,1,1.414,1.414L11.414,12l3.293,3.293A1,1,0,0,1,14,17Z"/></g></svg>
        </button>
        <button class="before-after-btn-next-{{ section.id }}">
          <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><g><path d="M14,17a1,1,0,0,1-.707-.293l-4-4a1,1,0,0,1,0-1.414l4-4a1,1,0,1,1,1.414,1.414L11.414,12l3.293,3.293A1,1,0,0,1,14,17Z"/></g></svg>
        </button>
      </div>
      <div class="before-after-bottom-{{ section.id }}">
        {% for block in section.blocks %}
          <div class="before-after-bottom-item-{{ section.id }} {% if forloop.first %}active{% endif %}">
            {% if block.settings.bottom_title != blank %}
              <p class="before-after-bottom-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.bottom_title }}</p>
            {% endif %}
            {% if block.settings.bottom_text != blank %}
              <div class="before-after-bottom-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.bottom_text }}</div>
            {% endif %}
          </div>
        {% endfor %}
      </div>
    </div>
</div>

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.js"></script>

<script>
  function initScrollingProducts() {
    const slider = new Swiper(".before-after-slider-{{ section.id }}", {
      speed: 300,
      loop: true,
      simulateTouch: false,
      autoHeight: true,
      effect: "fade",
      fadeEffect: { crossFade: true },
      navigation: {
        nextEl: '.before-after-btn-next-{{ section.id }}',
        prevEl: '.before-after-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}',
      },
      pagination: {
        el: '.before-after-pagination-{{ section.id }}',
        type: 'bullets',
        clickable: true,
      },
    });
    slider.on('slideChange', () => {
      if (document.querySelectorAll('.before-after-bottom-item-{{ section.id }}')) {
        document.querySelectorAll('.before-after-bottom-item-{{ section.id }}').forEach((el, index) => {
          var activeSlideIndex = slider.realIndex;
          el.classList.remove('active');
          if (index == activeSlideIndex) {
            el.classList.add('active');
          }
        })
      }
    });
  }

  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initScrollingProducts);
  
  if (Shopify.designMode) {
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:unload', initScrollingProducts);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', initScrollingProducts);
  }
</script>

lazy.label: Lazy load
lazy.description: Lazy load images for speed optimisation
